import React, {useRef} from 'react'; import './Homepage.css' export default function Home() { const scroll = (event) => { if (event.originalEvent.wheelDelta < 0) { const myRef = useRef(null) const executeScroll = () => myRef.current.scrollIntoView() } } return (
scroll(event)}>
